titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of antibiotics administered intraveneously at home to patients with a chronic infectious disease requiring long-term intravenous antibiotic therapy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include within the definition of "medical and other health services" the services and supplies furnished by or under the supervision of a physician in connection with intravenous antibiotic therapy furnished in the patient's home to a patient with a chronic infectious disease requiring long-term intravenous antibiotic therapy.
